Name: Basilico
Review Text: I always order here. Love it, taste incredible & the workers are great. I do not give 5 stars that easily, nor am i doing it to get something back but this is well deserved

Name: Basilico
Review Text: Awesome tasty pizza, taste was spicy and pretty close to Indian taste. Loved it. The dough was very freshly prepared, in fact I saw the guy preparing it. Ingredients were also very fresh and in abundance. The staff was good and polite. I will definitely visit again.

Name: Basilico
Review Text: Lovely pizza. Nothing too fancy, but everything's simply great.
